parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The corrosion of rear brake lines can cause brake failure, leading to accidents, injuries, and fatalities.
symptoms: brakes do not respond to pedal input
vehicle takes longer to stop than usual.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Intermittent braking problems can cause accidents, injuries, and fatalities due to the unpredictable nature of the brake failure.
symptoms: brakes do not respond to pedal input
vehicle takes longer to stop than usual
brakes may work normally at times but fail intermittently.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: ABS system failure can cause accidents, injuries, and fatalities due to the loss of braking power and control.
symptoms: brakes do not respond to pedal input
vehicle takes longer to stop than usual
ABS light may illuminate on the dashboard.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Brake pedal issues can cause accidents, injuries, and fatalities due to the loss of braking power and control.
symptoms: brake pedal does not return to its normal position
brake pedal has a delayed return to its normal position
brake pedal has a sudden loss of pressure.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The clutch shudder/judder can cause the driveline and entire car to shake, leading to a loss of control and potentially causing accidents.
symptoms: The clutch shakes the driveline and entire car

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Transmission problems can cause hesitation, no power on acceleration, and hard engagement from a dead stop, leading to a loss of control and potentially causing accidents.
symptoms: hard transmission engagement from a dead stop.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Rear Wheel Cradle and Drive Train Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the rear wheel cradle and drive train can cause the drive line to drop out, leading to a loss of control and potentially causing accidents.
symptoms: the vehicle has a poor drive feel
the rear wheel cradle and drive train fail.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Unintended vehicle movement can cause accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: even when the parking brake is applied.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Takata Airbag Recall: Delayed or Unavailable Replacement Parts
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The delay or unavailability of replacement parts for the Takata airbag recall can lead to a significant safety risk, as drivers are advised not to allow passengers in the front seat, and the vehicle may not be safe to operate.
symptoms: inadequate communication from manufacturer or dealership

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Engine stalling and hesitation can cause loss of control, accidents, and strand the driver. It can also lead to increased risk of rear-end collisions.
symptoms: hesitation when taking off in first gear
vehicle pulls to the left when driving

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Engine block failure can cause engine damage, leading to costly repairs and potentially leaving the driver stranded.
Uncontrollable steering wheel vibration can cause loss of control, accidents, and make it difficult to drive the vehicle.
symptoms: Odor coming from the vent area
engine revs all the way to the red when the key is taken out.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Reverse light failure can increase the risk of accidents, especially when reversing in low-light conditions.
